name: Powell
line: This the wall she was talking about, Chief?

name: Hopper
line: A trooper found something in the water that's at the quarry. Our working theory right now is that Will crashed his bike, he made his way over the quarry and accidentally fell in. The earth must have given way.

name: Hopper
line: Joyce? Do you understand what I'm saying?

name: Joyce
line: No. Whoever you found is not my boy. It's not Will.

name: Hopper
line: Joyce.

name: Joyce
line: No, you don't understand. I talked to him a half hour ago. He was here. He was talking with these.

name: Hopper
line: Talking?

name: Joyce
line: Uh-huh. One blink for yes, two for no. And then I made this so he could talk to me. 'Cause he was hiding from that thing.

name: Hopper
line: The thing that came out of the wall? The thing that chased you?

name: Joyce
line: Yeah.

name: Jonathan
line: Mom, come on, please. You've gotta stop this.

name: Joyce
line: No, maybe he's... It's after him! He's in danger. We have to find him! We...

name: Hopper
line: What exactly was this thing? It was some kind of animal, you said?

name: Joyce
line: Uh, no, it was almost human, but it wasn't. It had these long arms and it didn't have a face.

name: Hopper
line: It didn't have a face? Joyce, listen to me. After Sarah I saw her, too. And I heard her. I didn't know what was real. And then I figured out that it was in my mind. And I had to pack all that away. Otherwise, I was gonna fall down a hole that I couldn't get out of.

name: Joyce
line: No, you're talking about grief. This is different.

name: Hopper
line: I'm just saying that you...

name: Joyce
line: No, I know what you're saying, Hop. I swear to you, I know what I saw. And I'm not crazy.

name: Hopper
line: I'm not saying that you're crazy.

name: Joyce
line: No... You are. And I understand, but God, I need you to believe me. Please.

name: Hopper
line: Listen... I think you should go to the morgue tomorrow and see him for yourself. It'll give you the answers that you need. But tonight I want you to try to get some sleep, if you can.

name: Unknown
line: Byers' body was found in the water of this quarry by state police earlier this evening. It was discovered by state trooper David O'Bannon, just after dark. The state police are mounting an investigation to determine Byers' cause of death, but an initial inquiry...

name: Karen
line: Should I go down and talk to Michael?

name: Ted
line: Give him time. He'll come to us when he's ready.

name: Mike
line: Can you please stop that? Are you deaf? I thought we were friends, you know? But friends tell each other the truth. And they definitely don't lie to each other. You made me think Will was okay, that he was still out there, but he wasn't. He wasn't! Maybe you thought you were helping, but you weren't. You hurt me. Do you understand? What you did sucks. Lucas was right about you. All along.

name: Will
line: ♪ So come on and let me know ♪ ♪ Should I stay or should I go? ♪ ♪ Should I stay or should I go now? ♪ ♪ Should I stay or should I go now? ♪ ♪ If I go there will be trouble ♪ ♪ If I stay it will be double ♪

name: Mike
line: Will, is that you? It's Mike! Do you copy? Over. Will, are you there? Will!

name: Dustin
line: Was that... Was it...

name: Mike
line: Will.

name: Will
line: Mom...

name: Jonathan
line: Mom! Wake up.

name: Joyce
line: What... what time is it?

name: Jonathan
line: It's almost 8:00. We have to go.

name: Joyce
line: Go where? Where?

name: Jonathan
line: To see Will.

name: Karen
line: Michael? Hi, honey. How are you feeling?

name: Mike
line: I, uh... I don't think I can go to school today.

name: Karen
line: Oh, that's fine, sweetie. I need to drop off Nance, then I'm gonna check in on Barb's parents. Why don't you grab a book or something and come with me? We can stop by the video store on the way back, pick out whatever you want. Even R-rated.

name: Mike
line: I think I just want to stay home today. I mean, if that's okay?

name: Karen
line: Well, are you sure you're gonna be all right here by yourself?

name: Mike
line: I think so.

name: Karen
line: Okay. But if you need anything, call Dad at work.

name: Mike
line: Okay.

name: Karen
line: Bye, sweetie.

name: Mike
line: Lucas, do you copy? Lucas, come on, I know you're there! This is urgent. I'm serious. I'm not gonna stop until you answer. Lucas. Lucas! Lucas, Lucas, Lucas, Lucas, Lucas...

name: Lucas
line: Go away, Mike. I'm not in the mood, all right? Over and out.

name: Mike
line: No, not 'out.' I'm not messing around, okay? This is about Will. Over.

name: Lucas
line: What about Will? You mean about his funeral? Over.

name: Mike
line: No, not his funeral. Screw his funeral! Just get over here stat. And bring Dustin. Over and out.

name: Jonathan
line: What's taking so long?

name: Coroner
line: Well, everything's been a bit chaotic around here without Gary.

name: Jonathan
line: Without Gary?

name: Coroner
line: Well, I thought you knew. Those men from State, they sent Gary home last night.

name: Jonathan
line: So who did the autopsy?

name: Coroner
line: Someone from State.

name: Joyce
line: He has a birth mark on his right arm. Can you show that to me, please?

name: Hopper
line: How's your mom doing?

name: Jonathan
line: I don't know. How long's this stuff been going on? With the lights and Will and the thing in the wall?

name: Hopper
line: Since the first phone call, I guess.

name: Jonathan
line: You know, she's had anxiety problems in the past. But this... I don't know. I'm worried it could be... Ugh, I don't know. She'll be okay. We'll be okay. My mom she's tough.

name: Hopper
line: Yeah, she is. Hey. She is.

name: Coroner
line: Ma'am! Ma'am, I need you to sign!

name: Joyce
line: I don't know what you think that thing is in there, but that is not my son!

name: Jonathan
line: Joyce, wait a second.

name: Joyce
line: No!

name: Nancy
line: So, wait a sec. I don't understand. You went back to my house?

name: Steve
line: To look for Barb.

name: Nancy
line: Yeah, okay, but why didn't you just talk to me? That's crazy.

name: Steve
line: I don't know, I was scared.

name: Nancy
line: You seriously think you saw a guy in a mask just hanging out in my yard?

name: Steve
line: I don't think it was a mask.

name: Nancy
line: But he had no face?

name: Steve
line: I don't know! I don't know, I just have a terrible feeling about this.

name: Nancy
line: Oh, this is bad. This is really bad. The cops they're gonna want to talk to all of us now. Tommy, Carol, everybody who was at the party.

name: Steve
line: So?

name: Nancy
line: My parents are gonna murder me!

name: Steve
line: Are you serious right now?

name: Nancy
line: You don't understand. My dad's a grade-A asshole.

name: Steve
line: Barb is missing! And you're worried about your dad?

name: Nancy
line: Okay, just when you talk to the cops, just don't mention the beers. It's just gonna get us both in trouble, and Barbara's got nothing to do with it, okay?

name: Nancy
line: I can't believe you right now. I can't believe you.

name: Steve
line: Nancy. Nancy, wait! Nancy!

name: Jonathan
line: Mom, will you get in?

name: Joyce
line: No, I need to think. Just go on home.

name: Jonathan
line: Mom, will you just get in, please? Mom. Mom! Mom.

name: Joyce
line: Stop. Just go home, Jonathan.

name: Jonathan
line: No, this is not an okay time for you to shut down.

name: Joyce
line: Shut down? What...

name: Jonathan
line: We have to deal with this, Mom. We have to deal with the funeral!

name: Joyce
line: The funeral? For who? For that thing back there? Okay, let me get this straight. Will, that's not his body, because he's in the lights, right? And there's a monster in the wall? Do you even hear yourself?

name: Jonathan
line: I know it sounds crazy. I sound crazy! You think I don't know that? It is crazy! But I heard him, Jonathan. He talked to me! Will is calling to me! And he's out there, and he's alone, and he's scared, and I don't care if anyone believes me! I am not gonna stop looking for him until I find him and bring him home. I am going to bring him home!

name: Jonathan
line: Yeah, well, while you're talking to the lights, the rest of us are having a funeral for Will! I'm not letting him sit in that freezer another day!

name: Unknown
line: All right, show's over.

name: Mike
line: We keep losing the signal, but you heard it, right?

name: Lucas
line: Yeah, I heard a baby.

name: Mike
line: What?

name: Lucas
line: Mike, you obviously tapped into a baby monitor. It's probably the Blackburns' next door.

name: Mike
line: Uh, did that sound like a baby to you? That was Will!

name: Lucas
line: Mike...

name: Mike
line: Lucas, you don't understand. He spoke last night. Words! He was singing that weird song he loves. Even El heard him!

name: Lucas
line: Oh, well, if the weirdo heard him, then I guess...

name: Mike
line: Are you sure you're on the right channel?

name: Lucas
line: I don't think it's about that. I think, somehow, she's channeling him.

name: Dustin
line: Like Professor X.

name: Mike
line: Yeah.

name: Lucas
line: Are you actually believing this crap?

name: Dustin
line: I don't know, I mean do you remember when Will fell off his bike and broke his finger? He sounded a lot like that.

name: Lucas
line: Did you guys not see what I saw? They pulled Will's body out of the water. He's dead!

name: Mike
line: Well, maybe it's his ghost. Maybe he's haunting us.

name: Lucas
line: It's not his ghost.

name: Mike
line: So how do you know that?

name: Lucas
line: I just do!

name: Mike
line: Then what was in that water?

name: Lucas
line: I don't know! All I know is Will is alive. Will is alive! He's out there somewhere. All we have to do is find him.

name: Mike
line: This isn't gonna work. We need to get El to a stronger radio.

name: Dustin
line: Mr. Clarke's Heathkit ham shack.

name: Mike
line: Yeah.

name: Dustin
line: The Heathkit's at school. There is no way we're gonna get the weirdo in there without anyone noticing. I mean look at her.

name: Mike
line: Wow.

name: Dustin
line: She looks...

name: Mike
line: Pretty. Good. You look pretty good.

name: Eleven
line: Pretty. Good.

name: Unknown
line: You boys hear me all right in there?

name: Shepard
line: Loud and clear, Shepard.

name: Unknown
line: Good luck in there, son.

name: Unknown
line: The brown current ran swiftly out of the heart of darkness, bearing us down towards the sea with twice the speed of our upward progress. And Kurtz's life was running swiftly, too...

name: Powell
line: Nancy Wheeler? If you'll come with me, please?

name: Powell
line: This argument you and Barbara had? What exactly was it about?

name: Nancy
line: It wasn't really an argument. Barb just wanted to leave. I didn't, so, I told her to just go home.

name: Powell
line: Then what?

name: Nancy
line: Then I went upstairs to put on some dry clothes.

name: Powell
line: And the next day, you went back and saw a bear, you're thinking?

name: Nancy
line: I don't know what it was, but I think maybe it took Barb. You need to check behind Steve's house...

name: Powell
line: We did. There's nothing there. There's no sign of a bear.

name: Callahan
line: And no car. Look. We figure that Barbara came back last night and then she took off, went somewhere else.

name: Powell
line: Has she ever talked to you about running off? Leaving town, maybe?

name: Nancy
line: No. No, Barb wouldn't do that, ever.

name: Powell
line: She wasn't maybe upset about the fact that you were spending time with this boy? Uh, Steve Harrington?

name: Nancy
line: What? No!

name: Powell
line: Maybe she was jealous because she saw you go up to Steve's room?

name: Nancy
line: It wasn't like that.

name: Powell
line: Like what?

name: Nancy
line: Steve and me, we're just friends. We just talked.

name: Powell
line: Now was this before or after you changed out of your clothes?

name: Hopper
line: So, Gary, tell me about these troopers that brought in Will.

name: Gary
line: It was about six of 'em, I'd say.

name: Hopper
line: They're all Staties?

name: Gary
line: Yes, sir.

name: Hopper
line: Never seen that many troopers come with a body before.

name: Gary
line: They told you that they were gonna take care of the autopsy, huh? Yeah. Claimed jurisdiction. Kicked me out. Well, it all seemed a bit over the top to me, considering this was Will Byers and not John F. Kennedy.

name: Hopper
line: Thanks for stopping by, Gary.

name: Gary
line: Sure thing.

name: Reporter
line: ...let the people know that, uh, the troopers are on duty and you should be safe, because we think this is just an isolated incident.

name: Reporter
line: State trooper David O'Bannon, thank you so much for your help.

name: O'Bannon
line: Thank you, sir.

name: Mike
line: Okay, remember, if anyone sees us, look sad.

name: Man on PA
line: Attention students, there will be an assembly to honor Will Byers in the gymnasium now. Do not go to fourth period.

name: Mike
line: It's locked.

name: Lucas
line: What?

name: Mike
line: Hey, do you think you can open it? With your powers?

name: Mr. Clarke
line: Boys?

name: Lucas
line: Hey.

name: Mr. Clarke
line: Assembly's about to start.

name: Mike
line: We know. We're just, you know upset.

name: Dustin
line: Yeah, definitely upset.

name: Lucas
line: We need some alone time.

name: Mike
line: To cry.

name: Mr. Clarke
line: Yeah, listen I get it. I do. I know how hard this is, but let's just be there for Will, huh? And then the Heathkit is all yours for the rest of the day. What do you say? I don't believe we've met. What's your name?

name: Eleven
line: Eleven...

name: Mike
line: Eleanor! She's my, uh...

name: Lucas
line: Cousin.

name: Dustin
line: Second cousin.

name: Mike
line: She's here for Will's funeral.

name: Mr. Clarke
line: Ah, well, welcome to Hawkins Middle, Eleanor. I wish you were here under better circumstances.

name: Eleven
line: Thank you.

name: Mr. Clarke
line: Uh, where are you from exactly?

name: Eleven
line: Bad place...

name: Mike
line: Sweden!

name: Dustin
line: I have a lot of Swedish family.

name: Mike
line: She hates it there.

name: Dustin
line: Cold!

name: Mike
line: Subzero.

name: Mr. Clarke
line: Shall we?

name: Mike
line: Yep!

name: Principal
line: At times like these it is important that we come together as a community. We come together to heal, we come together to grieve...

name: Karen
line: You lied to the police!

name: Nancy
line: I didn't lie!

name: Karen
line: How naive do you think I am? You and Steve were just talking? We slept together! Is that what you want to know? It doesn't matter!

name: Karen
line: It does matter!

name: Nancy
line: No! It is all bullshit! It has nothing to do with Barb and she's missing. And something terrible happened to her. I know it. I know it! And no one is listening to me!

name: Karen
line: Sweetie, sweetie, I'm listening. I'm listening to you...

name: Nancy
line: No! You're not! Just leave me alone!

name: Unknown
line: Shepard, come in. Confirm comm.

name: Shepard
line: This is Shepard. Confirming, over.

name: Unknown
line: Shepard. Where are you? Can you describe to us what it is you see? Over.

name: Shepard
line: It's low visibility. I'm about 1 klick south of the rift. Everything's still here, but it's all eroding. It's covered in--

name: Unknown
line: Shepard? Do you copy?

name: Shepard
line: There's something else... There's something else in here!

name: Shepard
line: Pull me out! Pull me out, pull me out! Pull me out!

name: Unknown
line: Reel him in.

name: Man
line: Get him in.

name: Unknown
line: Come on, come on! Faster!

name: Man 1
line: Shepard, come in. Over.

name: Man 2
line: Comms are down, sir.

name: Man 1
line: Shepard, come in! Over.

name: Principal
line: Will Byers' death is an unimaginable tragedy. Will was an exceptional student and a wonderful friend to all of us. It's impossible to express the hole his loss will leave in our community. I'd like to introduce you to Sandy Sloane. She's a local grief counselor from the church over in Jonesboro. But before she comes up here, I just want those of you who are having trouble dealing with this tragic loss...

name: Unknown
line: Look at these fakers.

name: Dustin
line: They probably didn't even know his name till today.

name: Troy
line: Who is interested in this? This is so stupid. Blah, blah, blah, blah, blah... Oh, he was such a great student. Oh, he's going to leave a hole in the community.

name: Eleven
line: Mouth breather.

name: Mike
line: Hey! Hey! Hey, Troy! You think this is funny?

name: Troy
line: What'd you say, Wheeler?

name: Mike
line: I saw you guys laughing over there. And I think that's a real messed up thing to do.

name: Unknown
line: Didn't you listen to the counselor, Wheeler? Grief shows itself in funny ways.

name: Troy
line: Besides, what's there to be sad about, anyway? Will's in fairyland now, right? Flying around with all the other little fairies. All happy and gay!

name: Troy
line: You're dead, Wheeler! Dead!

name: Dustin
line: Dude, Troy peed himself.

name: Dustin
line: Holy shit!

name: Unknown
line: Hey! What's going on here?

name: Mike
line: Mike! Let's go!

name: Funeral Director
line: It's made of soft wood with a crepe interior. Uh, now, I don't know what your budget is, but over here, we have copper and bronze.

name: Jonathan
line: Can you just give me a second?

name: Nancy
line: Hey.

name: Jonathan
line: Hey.

name: Nancy
line: Your mom, um she said you'd be here. I just can we talk for a second?

name: Jonathan
line: It looks like it could be some kind of perspective distortion, but I wasn't using the wide angle. I don't know. It's weird.

name: Nancy
line: And you're sure you didn't see anyone else out there?

name: Jonathan
line: No. And she was there one second and then gone. I figured she bolted.

name: Nancy
line: The cops think that she ran away. But they don't know Barb. And I went back to Steve's and I thought I saw something. Some weird man or I don't know what it was. I'm sorry. I shouldn't have come here today. I'm so sorry.

name: Jonathan
line: What'd he look like? This man you saw in the woods. What'd he look like?

name: Nancy
line: I don't know. It was almost like he didn't have a face?

name: Jonathan
line: How did you know that?

name: Hopper
line: Aw, come on! Another, please. And another for my, uh, friend here.

name: O'Bannon
line: Oh, thanks, man. Appreciate it.

name: Hopper
line: Yeah, that's all right. I'm, uh I'm celebrating. My daughter, she won the spelling bee today.

name: O'Bannon
line: Is that right?

name: Hopper
line: Yeah, that's right. 'Odontalgia.' That was the word. You know what it means? It's a fancy name for a toothache.

name: O'Bannon
line: Yeah, she's smart. She's real smart. Don't know where she gets it from. I've been tryin' to figure that out for years.

name: Hopper
line: Your daughter, she got a name? Your daughter? What's her name?

name: O'Bannon
line: Sarah. Her name's Sarah.

name: Hopper
line: To Sarah.

name: O'Bannon
line: I recognize you. Are you famous or somethin'?

name: Hopper
line: Uh, you might have seen me on TV, I, uh I found that Byers boy.

name: O'Bannon
line: So, you on that case or what?

name: Hopper
line: I just saw him on patrol, you know? Dumb luck.

name: O'Bannon
line: So that quarry, that's, uh that's state-run, where they found the boy, huh?

name: Hopper
line: Yeah.

name: O'Bannon
line: Yeah, well, that's funny. 'Cause, you know, I know for a fact that it's run by the Sattler Company. Frank Sattler? Decent guy, still got a couple operational quarries up in Roane.

name: Hopper
line: Is that right? That's right. So why are you lying to me, man?

name: O'Bannon
line: What's your problem, bud?

name: Hopper
line: I don't have a problem. I'm just a concerned citizen.

name: O'Bannon
line: Well, stick your nose someplace else. The kid is dead. End of story. Thanks for ruining the game, dick.

name: Hopper
line: Okay... Let's try this one more time. Who told you to be out there? What were you doing out there?

name: O'Bannon
line: I don't know! I don't know. They just told me to call it in and not let anybody get too close.

name: Hopper
line: Get close to what?

name: O'Bannon
line: The body.

name: Hopper
line: Who do you work for? The NSA? Hawkins Lab?

name: O'Bannon
line: You're gonna get us both killed.

name: Hopper
line: Who is that? Hey! Hey!

name: Joyce
line: Come on! Come on! Talk to me! I know you're here!

name: Mike
line: Come on.

name: Dustin
line: Now what?

name: Mike
line: She'll find him. Right, El?

name: Joyce
line: Eleven? Are you listening? That man before you I need you to find him.

name: Eleven
line: Hurt him?

name: Joyce
line: No. No, I don't want you to hurt him. I want you to listen to him.

name: Eleven
line: Listen?

name: Joyce
line: Yes. I want you to listen to what he says and repeat his words back to me. Just like we used to with those old nursery rhymes. Do you remember? Do you think you can do that for me?

name: Eleven
line: Mmm-hmm.

name: Man 1
line: Begin.

name: Man 2
line: Amulet. Frigid. Evolve. Airplane.

name: Joyce
line: Eleven? Repeat the words.

name: Man 2
line: Apricot. Peninsula. Game. Enchantment. Mouse. Balloon.

name: Mike
line: She's doing it. She's finding him!

name: Dustin
line: This is crazy.

name: Lucas
line: Calm down. She just closed her eyes.

name: Will
line: Mom?

name: Joyce
line: Will? Will! I'm here! I'm here!

name: Mike
line: Will, it's us! Are you there? Can you hear us? We're here!

name: Will
line: Hello? Mom?

name: Dustin
line: Why can't he hear us?

name: Mike
line: I don't know!

name: Joyce
line: Baby Oh, thank God. Will! Tell me where you are! How do I get to you?

name: Will
line: It's like home, but it's so dark It's so dark and empty. And it's cold! Mom? Mom!

name: Joyce
line: Listen to me! I swear I'm gonna get to you, okay? But right now, I need you to hide.

name: Will
line: Mom, please! Mom, it's coming!

name: Joyce
line: No, no, listen! Listen, I will find you, but you have to run now! Run! Run!

name: Mike
line: El, are you okay?

name: Lucas
line: Can you move?

name: Mike
line: Here, help her up.

name: Nancy
line: And you're...

name: Jonathan
line: Brightening. Enlarging.

name: Nancy
line: Hmm. Did your mom say anything else? Like, um, where it might have gone to, or...

name: Jonathan
line: No, just that it came out of the wall.

name: Nancy
line: How long does this take?

name: Jonathan
line: Not long.

name: Nancy
line: Have you been doing this a while?

name: Jonathan
line: What?

name: Nancy
line: Photography?

name: Jonathan
line: Yeah. I guess I'd rather observe people than, you know talk to them.

name: Nancy
line: I know. It's weird.

name: Jonathan
line: No!

name: Nancy
line: No, it is. It's just, sometimes people don't really say what they're really thinking. But you capture the right moment it says more.

name: Jonathan
line: What was I saying?

name: Nancy
line: What?

name: Jonathan
line: When you took my picture.

name: Nancy
line: I shouldn't have taken that. I'm, uh I'm sorry. It's just...

name: Jonathan
line: That's it. That's what I saw.

name: Nancy
line: My mom I thought she was crazy 'cause she said that's not Will's body. That he's alive.

name: Jonathan
line: And if he's alive...

name: Nancy
line: Then Barbara.

name: Hopper
line: Hey, Patty! Oh, you know, I forgot my hat.

name: Patty
line: Oh.

name: Hopper
line: I'll just be a minute. Hey, I love that book. It's a nasty mutt.

name: Unknown
line: Hey, you can't be back here.

name: Hopper
line: Yeah, I just got off the line with O'Bannon. He said that he needs to see you at the station. It's some emergency...

name: Unknown
line: What the hell are you talking about? I don't work with O'Bannon.

name: Hopper
line: Did I say O'Bannon? I meant Okay.

name: Lonnie
line: Babe Jesus, the hell happened?

name: Joyce
line: Lonnie.
